special_text:
Fable [i](You may trigger the chapters of this saga in any order. You choose which chapter to use as you place lore counters on it.)[/i]
I – Add one mana of any color.
II – Scry 2.
III – Until end of turn, if a creature or land entering the battlefield causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.
